::Zardus/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Zardus turns as the two females pass him, a neutral look on his face as he 
looks at them.

"I'm afraid I must insist on you accompanying me," he says, firing his gun 
without warning at the back to Iron Raptor's neck. Seeing his leader open 
fire, Perndabot fires his rifle at Iron Raptor's back.

"Well, so much for going peacefully," Reptilica comments as he and 
Bloodystrike open fire on Tavatron.
